summary:
Botswana is a country in southern Africa, known for its vast Kalahari Desert. It's home to around 2.4 million people, mainly the Tswana ethnic group. The country gained independence from British rule in 1966 and has since been a democratic republic.

Its economy is successful, thanks to diamond mining and tourism. Botswana is one of Africa's least corrupt nations and has a high standard of living. It's a member of various international organizations, including the United Nations and the Commonwealth of Nations.
title: Botswana
